A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie! It's awesome to see a break from the hum drum tempo in older movies. Plus the twist and plot development were on point. Tons of people were upset because they spent 2 years fantasizing about what they wanted to happen. You have to remember no one wants to see a movie where it's predictable and contrived. Personally\, I wanted to see Luke come down from the heavens and destroy all the badies with the force. Overall\, it was a great addition to the series that lays a solid framework for the future. Plus that cameo was awesome!
